info.name: Seo
info.description: Comprehensive SEO optimization fields for better search engine visibility

h1Title.description: Main heading for the page (can be different from meta title)

primaryKeywords.description: Primary keywords for title, intro, headers, meta (comma-separated)

secondaryKeywords.description: Secondary keywords to sprinkle naturally in body text (comma-separated)

internalLinks.description: Suggested internal links for SEO and user experience

externalLinks.description: Suggested external links for SEO balance

openGraphTitle.description: Custom Open Graph title (if different from meta title)

openGraphDescription.description: Custom Open Graph description (if different from meta description)
